title: The Minister for Agriculture, Food and Marine consents to the foregoing Order.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the National Treasury Management Agency 

(Amendment) Act 2014 (State Authority) Order 2025.
text_norm: 1 order may cited national treasury management agency (amendment) act 2014 (state authority) order 2025

title: The Minister for Agriculture, Food and Marine consents to the foregoing Order.
heading: 2. An Rialálaí Agraibhia is prescribed for the purposes of paragraph (j) of
text_raw:
2. An Rialálaí Agraibhia is prescribed for the purposes of paragraph (j) of 
the definition of “State authority” in section 31(1) of the National Treasury 
Management Agency (Amendment) Act 2014 (No. 23 of 2014). 

The Minister for Agriculture, Food and Marine consents to the foregoing Order. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

25 September, 2025. 

MARTIN HEYDON, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

30 September, 2025. 

PASCHAL DONOHOE, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 3rd October, 2025. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [442] 3
